mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia Tours the Kitchen at Mount Vernon, January 14, 1947
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia and a member of his party exit the kitchen at Mount Vernon. The photograph is adhered to card stock with a printed caption below: Visiting Mount Vernon, home of the first United States president, His Royal Highness leaves the kitchen of the old mansion, escorted by His Excellency, Ambassador Fuad Bey Hamza.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Kitchen
